Direct Translation: My orange tree has no fruit
Poetic Translation: My oranges have not yet ripened;

Direct Translation: But no one may touch me.
Poetic Translation: But not yet may you touch me.
The fruit is not even growing.
The fruit is not even growing;

Direct Translation: But no one may touch me.
Poetic Translation: But not yet may you touch me.
The fruit is not yet arriving.
The fruit is not yet arriving;

Direct Translation: But no one may touch me.
Poetic Translation: But not yet may you touch me.
